name: Ishitaaaaa
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: My blessing always be with you! there's more, wait for your physical gift box ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Many many happy returns....blah blah
text2: That's what I was going to do.

outroText: Okay, now better come back and tell me you liked it <3
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
